description: He hasn't been seen out since being slapped with a DUI charge after crashing his luxury Mercedes-Benz S55 in Los Angeles in October.
title: Nicky Hilton and Brandon Davis have dinner a month after his DUI crash
title_page: Nicky Hilton and Brandon Davis have dinner a month after his DUI crash | Daily Mail Online
text:
He hasn't been seen out since being slapped with a DUI charge after crashing his luxury Mercedes-Benz S55 in Los Angeles in October.
But it seems Nicky Hilton was able to persuade her BFF, oil heir Brandon Davis, to join her for dinner in New York on Friday.
The high society couple turned up in different cars for their intimate tete-a-tete.
Scroll down for video
Meet up: Nicky Hilton persuade her BFF, oil heir Brandon Davis, to join her for dinner in New York on Friday
The 32-year-old hotel heiress wore a leopard print coat over a black roll neck sweater, black leather skinny jeans and ankle booties.
Nicky, who married banker James Rothschild in a lavish ceremony in the Orangery at London's Kensington Palace last summer, pulled her blonde hair back into a low ponytail.
Her face was perfectly made-up with a splash of bright red on her lips. And she carried a black Chanel leather handbag on a chain.
Stepping out: The 36-year-old oil heir, who arrived separately from Nicky, reportedly hasn't been seen out in public since smashing up his car in Los Angeles in October. He was later charged with DUI
Brandon, 36, was casually dressed in a grey jacket, over a white T-shirt, blue corduroy trousers and dark blue suede shoes. His curly dark hair was neatly coiffed.
The grandson of oil tycoon and entertainment billionaire Marvin Davis was involved in the single car accident in the early hours of October 2.
The car rolled several times and was left a wreck. Brandon was treated at the scene and fitted with a neck brace before being taken to hospital by ambulance, where he was later arrested for DUI.
Write off: Brandon's Mercedes-Benz S55 was a total wreck after rolling several times
He wasn't officially charged until December.
Brandon was pictured earlier in the night drinking what appeared to be red wine while at Matsuhisa Restaurant in Beverly Hills with Hilary Duff's ex-husband Mike Comrie.
Brandon was well known on the party scene around 2006, where he kept company with Nicky and Paris Hilton and also dated actress Mischa Barton.
